properties.areaDesc: Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 12 at 9:02AM PST until February 13 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
8 to 12 feet expected.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST THURSDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PST THIS MORNING
